item.title: My First Post
item.description: Introduction This is bold text, and this is emphasized text. Visit the Hugo website! What about a code block? This is a code block in Go: package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("Hello, World!") } This is a numbered list. This is another item in the list. This is a bullet list. This is another item in the list. This is a blockquote. This is a horizontal rule: This is a table:
